task.prompt: Robert, a sales agent, earns a basic salary of $1250 per month and,  10% commission on his monthly sales. Last month, his total sales were $23600. He allocated 20% of his total earnings to savings and the rest of the money to his monthly expenses. How much were his monthly expenses last month?
